intro.p: Use the given information to find the area of the circular sector.

content.p: A sector of a circle has a center angle of {{angle}} ^{\circ}. What is the area of the sector if the radius is {{rad}} {{radunit}}? Please round your answer to two decimal places, show all your work and include the correct units in your answer.

outtro.p: The area of the sector is {{area}} {{radunit}} squared
